TypeSignature.Value: public interface Workbook : IDisposable, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public interface auto ansi abstract Workbook implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 表示 Excel 项目中的一个工作簿，这些项目通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

span.span: Represents a workbook in Excel projects created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象提供相同的成员从 Excel 主互操作程序集，但它的对象将添加以下功能：A object provides the same members as a object from the Excel primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features: - 属性。 property. 使用此属性添加到工作簿的智能标记。Use this property to add smart tags to a workbook. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性来获取基础对象主机项。Use this property to get the underlying object for a host item. 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建以编程方式通过使用对象`GetVstoObject`方法。In application-level projects, you can create objects programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). 在文档级项目中，你通常不使用直接对象。In document-level projects, you typically do not use objects directly. 请改用`ThisWorkbook`类以编程方式访问你的项目中的工作簿。Instead, use the `ThisWorkbook` class to programmatically access the workbook in your project. `ThisWorkbook`类派生其大多数成员从类。The `ThisWorkbook` class derives most of its members from the class. 此类将对其成员的所有调用重都定向到的内部实现接口中[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。This class redirects all calls to its members to an internal implementation of the interface in the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 指定特定工作表函数是否使用最新精度算法来计算其结果。

span.span: Specifies whether certain worksheet functions use the latest accuracy algorithms to calculate their results.

value.span: 一个指定特定工作表函数是否使用最新精度算法来计算其结果的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether certain worksheet functions use the latest accuracy algorithms to calculate their results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，工作表函数，从 Excel 2007 及更早版本的 Excel 使用新的算法，可提高其准确性。By default, some of the worksheet functions from Excel 2007 and earlier versions of Excel use new algorithms that increase their accuracy. 但是，在某些情况下，新的算法会降低这些函数相对于 Excel 2007 中其性能的性能和早期版本的 Excel。However, in some cases, the new algorithms decrease the performance of these functions relative to their performance in Excel 2007 and earlier versions of Excel. 若要指定这些工作表函数使用旧算法以提高其性能，设置属性设置为 1。To specify that these worksheet functions use the older algorithms to increase their performance, set the property to 1. 下表描述的可能设置属性。The following table describes the possible settings for the property. |设置Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |00|使用最新、 最准确地算法 （默认值）Use the latest, most accurate algorithms (default)| |11|使用 Excel 2007 或更早版本算法Use Excel 2007 or earlier version algorithms| |22|使用 Excel 2010 算法Use Excel 2010 algorithms| > [!NOTE] > 设置为 0、 1 或 2 以外的值的属性将导致未定义的行为。Setting the property to a value other than 0, 1, or 2 will result in undefined behavior. 下表总结了哪些功能受设置属性设置为 1。The following table summarizes which functions are affected by setting the property to 1. "函数不影响"列中列出的函数将始终使用最新的准确性算法或 Excel 2010 中未更改。The functions that are listed in the "Functions not affected" column will always use the latest accuracy algorithms or were not changed in Excel 2010. 有关在其名称中包含一个句点 （.） 的函数名称，以确定相应的函数的名称在中 VBA 作为实现的方法对象，请用下划线字符 (_) 代替时间段。For function names that include a period (.) in their names, to determine the name of the corresponding function implemented in VBA as a method of the object, substitute the underscore character ( _ ) for the period. 例如，对应于 BETA VBA 方法。DIST MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Activate() cil managed

summary.span: 激活工作簿的第一个关联窗口。

span.span: Activates the first window associated with the workbook.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这不会运行可能会附加到工作簿任何 Auto_Activate 或 Auto_Deactivate 宏 (使用方法来运行这些宏)。This does not run any Auto_Activate or Auto_Deactivate macros that might be attached to the workbook (use the method to run those macros).

summary.span: 在激活工作簿时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook is activated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你显示相同的工作簿的两个窗口之间切换事件发生，但工作簿的事件不会发生。When you switch between two windows showing the same workbook, the event occurs, but the event for the workbook does not occur. 创建一个新窗口时，此事件不会发生。This event does not occur when you create a new window.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象表示活动图表（嵌入图表或图表工作表）。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the active chart (either an embedded chart or a chart sheet).

span.span: An embedded chart is considered active when it is either selected or activated.

value.span: 对象，表示活动图表；如果无活动图表，则为 。

summary.span: 获取活动工作表（最上层的工作表）。

span.span: Gets the active sheet (the sheet on top).

value.span: 活动工作表（最上层的工作表）；如果无活动工作表，则为 。

span.span: The active sheet (the sheet on top); if no sheet is active.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作簿将显示在多个窗口中，此属性可能在不同的窗口中不同。If the workbook appears in more than one window, this property may be different in different windows.

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象表示活动工作簿或指定工作簿中的活动切片器。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the active slicer in the active workbook or in the specified workbook.

value.span: 一个 ，表示活动工作簿或指定工作簿中的活动切片器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不指定工作簿对象，此属性将返回 active 切片器中活动工作簿。If you do not specify a Workbook object, this property returns the active slicer in the active workbook. > [!NOTE] > 此属性将出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

summary.span: 在工作簿作为外接程序卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook is uninstalled as an add-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外接程序不会自动关闭时卸载。The add-in does not automatically close when it is uninstalled.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示每当工作簿自动更新时，是否将对共享工作簿所做的当前更改发送到其他用户。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether current changes to the shared workbook are posted to other users whenever the workbook is automatically updated.

value.span: 如果每当工作簿自动更新时，都将对共享工作簿所做的当前更改发送到其他用户，则为 。

span.span: if current changes to the shared workbook are posted to other users whenever the workbook is automatically updated.

value.span: 如果不发送更改（此工作簿仍与其他用户所做更改保持同步），则为 。

span.span: if changes are not posted (this workbook is still synchronized with changes made by other users).

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 5 到此属性才会生效 1440年情况下，属性必须设置为一个值。The property must be set to a value from 5 to 1440 for this property to take effect.

span.span: Occurs before the workbook closes.

summary.span: 如果工作簿已更改，则此事件在要求用户保存更改前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the workbook (or anything in it) is printed.

summary.span: 在保存工作簿前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the workbook is saved.

summary.span: 在 Microsoft Office Excel 保存工作簿的数据或将数据从工作簿导出到 XML 数据文件前发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保存为 XML 电子表格文件格式时，将不会发生此事件。This event will not occur when you are saving to the XML Spreadsheet file format.

summary.span: 在刷新现有 XML 数据连接前或将新 XML 数据导入工作簿前发生。

summary.span: 获取一个 Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties 集合，该集合表示工作簿的所有内置文档属性。

span.span: Gets a Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties collection that represents all the built-in document properties for the workbook.

value.span: A形式表示工作簿的所有内置文档属性的集合。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties collection that represents all the built-in document properties for the workbook.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回整个集合的内置文档属性。This property returns the entire collection of built-in document properties. 使用`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)`属性以返回集合的单个成员 (`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties`对象) 通过指定名称的属性或集合索引 （以数字）。Use the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)` property to return a single member of the collection (a `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties` object) by specifying either the name of the property or the collection index (as a number). 您可以参考文档属性，按索引值或名称。You can refer to document properties either by index value or by name. 以下列表显示可用的内置文档属性名称：The following list shows the available built-in document property names: - 标题Title - SubjectSubject - 作者Author - 关键字Keywords - 注释Comments - 模板Template - 最后一个作者Last Author - 修订号Revision Number - Application NameApplication Name - 上一次打印日期Last Print Date - 创建日期Creation Date - 上次保存时间Last Save Time - 编辑时间总计Total Editing Time - 页面数Number of Pages - 字的数目Number of Words - 字符数Number of Characters - 安全性Security - 类别Category - 格式Format - ManagerManager - 公司Company - 字节数Number of Bytes - 行数Number of Lines - 段落数Number of Paragraphs - 幻灯片数Number of Slides - 说明的数Number of Notes - 隐藏幻灯片数Number of Hidden Slides - 多媒体剪辑数Number of Multimedia Clips - 超链接基础Hyperlink Base - （带空格） 的字符数Number of Characters (with spaces) 容器应用程序不需要定义每个内置文档属性的值。Container applications are not required to define values for every built-in document property. 如果 Microsoft Office Excel 未定义的一个内置文档属性的值，读取`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Value`该文档属性的属性将引发异常。If Microsoft Office Excel does not define a value for one of the built-in document properties, reading the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Value` property for that document property throws an exception. 使用属性返回的自定义文档属性的集合。Use the property to return the collection of custom document properties.

summary.span: 获取一个数字，该数字指示上次对工作簿进行完全重新计算的 Excel 的版本。

span.span: Gets a number that indicates the version of Excel that the workbook was last fully recalculated by.

summary.span: 最右边四位是计算引擎的次版本号，其他位（左边）是 Microsoft Office Excel 的主版本。

span.span: The rightmost four digits are the minor calculation engine version number, and the other digits (on the left) are the major version of Microsoft Office Excel.

value.span: 一个数字，该数字指示上次对工作簿进行完全重新计算的 Excel 的版本。

span.span: A number that indicates the version of Excel that the workbook was last fully recalculated by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可使用以下参数。The property can be used with the following parameter. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Index`|索引数 （从 1 至 56) 工作簿调色板中的颜色。The index number of a color in the workbook color palette (from 1 to 56). 如果未指定此参数，此属性将返回包含所有 56 种颜色调色板中的数组。If this argument is not specified, this property returns an array that contains all 56 of the colors in the palette.| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get a object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 工作簿调色板中的 56 条目，每个表示 RGB 值。The workbook palette has 56 entries, each represented by an RGB value. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可以在工作簿的调色板为蓝色，请设置的第一个颜色，然后以编程方式显示 Microsoft Office Excel**调色板**对话框来验证是否此进行更改。The following code example uses the property to set the first color in the workbook's color palette to blue, and then programmatically displays the Microsoft Office Excel **Color Palette** dialog to verify that this change was made. 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkBook_AppLevelAddIn#11](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkBook_AppLevelAddIn/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkBook_AppLevelAddIn#11](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkBook_AppLevelAddIn/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当工作簿是嵌入其他应用程序中并由用户激活通过双击该工作簿时，使用通过工作簿对象的属性返回的一套 Excel 命令栏中其他应用程序可用。When a workbook is embedded in another application and activated by the user by double-clicking the workbook, using the property with a Workbook object returns the set of Excel command bars available within the other application. 在所有其他情况下，使用此属性的工作簿对象返回`null`。At all other times, using this property with a Workbook object returns `null`. 没有返回附加到工作簿的命令栏组无法通过编程方式。There is no programmatic way to return the set of command bars attached to a workbook. 命令条是与应用程序和不是工作簿相关联。Command bars are associated with the application and not the workbook. 此属性存在于工作簿上，因此 Excel 不为应用程序时，你可以访问 Excel 应用程序命令栏。This property exists on the workbook so you can access Excel application command bars when Excel is not the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Excel 失败，系统会出现故障，或如果系统不正确关闭的情况下 （不允许 Excel 不能保存更改的文件），打开备份的文件，并且用户有机会保存更改，否则可能已丢失。If Excel fails, the system fails, or if the system is improperly shut down (not allowing Excel to save the changed files), the backed up files are opened and the user has an opportunity to save changes that otherwise would have been lost. 当用户重启 Excel 时，将打开文档恢复窗口，向用户提供恢复他们正在处理的文件的选项。When the user restarts Excel, a document recovery window opens, giving the user an option to recover the files they were working on.

summary.span: 获取内置图标集的集合，这些图标集可用于对工作簿中的范围应用条件格式规则。

span.span: Gets the collection of built-in icon sets that can be used to apply a conditional formatting rule to a range in the workbook.

value.span: A Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSets包含内置的图标的收集组可应用到的区域的条件格式设置规则的对象。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSets collection that contains the built-in icon set objects that can be used to apply a conditional formatting rule to a range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用图标集以将范围数据划分到隔开阈值的三到五个类别。You can use an icon set to classify range data into three to five categories separated by threshold values. 每个图标表示一系列的值。Each icon represents a range of values. 例如，在`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows`图标集，红色向上箭头代表较高值、 黄色侧向箭头代表中间值，和绿色向下箭头表示较低的值。For example, in the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows` icon set, the red up arrow represents higher values, the yellow sideways arrow represents middle values, and the green down arrow represents lower values. 若要应用基于图标集条件格式设置规则，创建一个新`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition`使用`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition`方法属性的范围，或的命名范围的属性。To apply a conditional formatting rule based on an icon set, create a new `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition` by using the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition` method of the property of a range, or the property of a named range. 然后，设置`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition.IconSet`属性`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet`从检索的对象属性。Then, set the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition.IconSet` property to an `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet` object that you retrieve from the property. 若要指定`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet`你想要检索，则之一传递的对象`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet`枚举值的索引属性。To specify the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet` object that you want to retrieve, pass in one of the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet` enumeration values as an index to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置此属性为`true`，该工作簿具有以下特征：When you set this property to `true`, the workbook has the following characteristics: - 你不会提示保存工作簿，如果工作簿处于打开状态时进行更改。You are not prompted to save the workbook if changes are made while the workbook is open. - 工作簿窗口不可见。The workbook window is not visible. - 工作簿中的所有宏都都不显示在**宏**对话框 (通过指向显示**宏**上**工具**菜单，然后单击**宏**).Any macros in the workbook are not visible in the **Macro** dialog box (displayed by pointing to **Macro** on the **Tools** menu and clicking **Macros**). - 工作簿中的宏仍可运行从**宏**对话框中，即使它们是不可见。Macros in the workbook can still be run from the **Macro** dialog box even though they are not visible. 此外，宏名称不必是与工作薄名称限定的。In addition, macro names do not need to be qualified with the workbook name. - 按住 SHIFT 键，当您打开工作簿时无任何影响。Holding down the SHIFT key when you open the workbook has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在返回的名称是链接的文档、 版本，或 DDE 或 OLE 服务器的名称。The names in the returned are the names of the linked documents, editions, or DDE or OLE servers. 该数组的格式是一维数组的所有类型，但发布服务器和订阅服务器。The format of the array is a one-dimensional array for all types but publisher and subscriber. 返回的字符串包含的链接类型的相应表示法中的链接源的名称。The returned strings contain the name of the link source, in the appropriate notation for the link type. 例如，DDE 链接使用"服务器 | 文档 ！项"语法。For example, DDE links use the "Server|Document!Item" syntax. 有关发布服务器和订阅服务器的链接，则返回的数组是二维。For publisher and subscriber links, the returned array is two-dimensional. 数组的第一列包含的版本，名称和第二列包含的各个版本的引用为文本。The first column of the array contains the names of the edition, and the second column contains the references of the editions as text. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法需要用户的计算机上启用了传真服务。Using this method requires that the fax service is enabled on a user's computer. 用于指定中的传真号码的格式`Recipients`参数可以是`recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider`或`recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber`。The format used for specifying fax numbers in the `Recipients` parameter is either `recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider` or `recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber`. 您可以访问用户的传真提供程序信息使用以下注册表路径：You can access the user's fax provider information using the following registry path: `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\11.0\Common\Services\Fax` 在此注册表路径中使用 FaxAddress 键的值来确定要使用的收件人的格式。Use the value of the FaxAddress key at this registry path to determine the format to use for a recipient. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将其发布到 Excel Services 工作簿中，此属性返回的项的集合。This property returns a collection of the items in the workbook that you can publish to Excel Services. 在服务器上，将显示仅在此集合中的对象。Only objects in this collection will be shown on the server. 默认情况下，显示整个工作簿 （包括所有工作表）。By default, the entire workbook (including all worksheets) is shown. 只有一个对象可以存在每个工作簿。Only one object can exist per workbook. 此集合不能按名称，索引，因为没有被标记为可查看服务器上的对象的名称是唯一不能保证。This collection cannot be indexed by name, because there is no guarantee that the names of objects that are marked as viewable on the server are unique. 在 Excel 用户界面中，你可以查看的对象被标记为可在服务器上查看的集合**Excel Services 选项**对话框。In the Excel user interface, you can view the collection of objects that are marked as viewable on the server in the **Excel Services Options** dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `PasswordEncryptionProvider`， `PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm`，和`PasswordEncryptionKeyLength`参数不是相互独立。The `PasswordEncryptionProvider`, `PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm`, and `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength` parameters are not independent of each other. 所选的加密提供程序限制算法和密钥长度，可以选择的组。A selected encryption provider limits the set of algorithms and key length that can be chosen. 有关`PasswordEncryptionKeyLength`有参数是没有固有的密钥长度范围上限。For the `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength` parameter there is no inherent limit on the range of the key length. 它还确定加密算法加密服务提供程序由确定范围。The range is determined by the Cryptographic Service Provider which also determines the cryptographic algorithm. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不会在编辑或重新计算单元格以外的任何情况下发生。The event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells. 例如，它时不会出现数据透视表是刷新、 排序、 筛选，或向下钻取，即使这些操作移动单元格，并可能从 OLAP 数据源中检索新值。For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

summary.span: 在将更改应用于数据透视表之前发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 立即执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句以将所有更改都应用到数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源之前, 和用户已选择的用户界面以都应用更改后立即时发生事件。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 立即执行针对数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源，提交事务之前，用户已选择为整个数据透视表中保存更改后立即发生的事件。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

summary.span: 在放弃对数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 执行针对 OLAP 数据源，ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句，如果在事务仍处于活动状态，且然后用户已选择放弃所做的更改之后将丢弃所有数据透视表中, 编辑过的值之前，将发生此事件。This event occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

summary.span: 在工作簿宿主项关闭时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook host item shuts down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是要在中调用的最后一个事件对象作为对象卸载。This is the last event to be called in the object as the object unloads. 此事件用于任何其他清理过程。Use this event for any additional clean up. 文档级自定义项，当工作簿主机项关闭时，将卸载程序集的应用程序域。In a document-level customization, the application domain for the assembly unloads when the workbook host item shuts down. 在应用程序级外接程序，工作簿主机项关闭时，不会不卸载应用程序域。In an application-level add-in, the application domain does not unload when the workbook host item shuts down. 此外，基础的工作簿对象将不再可用。Also, the underlying workbook object is no more available. 若要访问工作簿，关闭使用之前相反。To access the workbook before it shuts down use instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要进行数字签名 Excel 工作簿和验证其他中它们的签名，你需要 Microsoft CryptoAPI 和唯一的数字签名证书。To digitally sign Excel workbooks and verify other signatures in them, you need the Microsoft CryptoAPI and a unique digital signature certificate. CryptoAPI 被安装 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4.01 或更高版本。The CryptoAPI is installed with Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later. 你可以从证书颁发机构获取数字签名证书。You can obtain a digital signature certificate from a certification authority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用强密码合并大写和小写字母、 数字和符号。Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。Weak passwords do not mix these elements. 强密码： Y6dh ！ et5。Strong password: Y6dh!et5. 弱密码： House27。Weak password: House27. 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UpdateFromFile() cil managed

summary.span: 如果磁盘版本比内存中加载的工作簿副本更新，则从保存的工作簿磁盘版本更新只读工作簿。

span.span: Updates a read-only workbook from the saved disk version of the workbook if the disk version is more recent than the copy of the workbook that is loaded in memory.

summary.span: 如果自加载工作簿以来还未更改过磁盘副本，则不重新加载工作簿的内存副本。

span.span: If the disk copy has not changed since the workbook was loaded, the in-memory copy of the workbook is not reloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作簿是以只读方式打开由用户 A 和由用户 B.打开作为读/写时，此方法很有用如果用户 A 仍然具有工作簿打开，用户将无法获取更新的副本，而无需关闭和重新打开工作簿和丢失视图设置时，用户 B 将较新版本的工作簿保存到磁盘中。This method is useful when a workbook is opened as read-only by user A and opened as read/write by user B. If user B saves a newer version of the workbook to disk while user A still has the workbook open, user A cannot get the updated copy without closing and reopening the workbook and losing view settings. 方法更新内存中副本的磁盘文件中的工作簿。The method updates the in-memory copy of the workbook from the disk file.
